title: Gbanu (1939) Genesis Portion (Genèse)
description: Gbanu (Gbànù, Banu, Gbanou) is a Gbaya language of the Central African Republic. The people do not consider themselves to be ethnically Gbaya.
provider: The British and Foreign Bible Society

language.name: Gbanu
language.area: Carnot and Bossembélé subprefectures, north of Bogangolo.
